pages.text: In a simlar manner as $(l:magnets/magic_magnets)magic magnets$(), magic electromagnets can teleport items to the player, but at the cost of energy. $(br2)Electromagnets use the tiers in Thermal Expansion; Leadstone, Hardened, Reinforced, Signalum, and Resonant, each having a different level of energy storage and range.
By default, Magic Electromagnets use more energy than regular $(l:magnets/electromagnets)electromagnets$(). $(br2)Each tier has more energy storage and range than the prior.
